page.title: 02Education in Thornton Area
page.content: {Infants'School,Pickering.}There are 232 pupils and 8 teachers.It has 8 rooms, a hall and kitchen. About 60 come from villages, the furthest about 8 miles away. {Routine.}Each day they follow 4 activities:Language,talking and writing are 1;number work,counting and weighing as another;Art and Craft, where they make models from lego and toys;and religion which is based on assemblies morning and afternoon.To end the day they have a story, music or poetry. About 150 stay for lunch, about 70 bring packed lunches and a few go home. {Games.}Girls skip and play un,deux trois in which the winner is whoever holds a handstand the longest. Boys play running games like tig.Mixed games include hopscotch and mothers and fathers.
